statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_policy_changes;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM environmental_policy_changes;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM environmental_policy_changes WHERE policy_effective_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_effective_date FROM environmental_policy_changes WHERE policy_id = '60F69A79-8F77-4293-BBB1-3913DA5ADCF7';
SELECT * FROM environmental_policy_changes WHERE policy_name LIKE '%carbon%';
SELECT * FROM environmental_policy_changes WHERE policy_id = 'c01b8c54-4dcd-47a2-9d47-9da8026e8dc3';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM environmental_policy_changes WHERE policy_effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, policy_effective_date FROM environmental_policy_changes ORDER BY policy_effective_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_policy_changes WHERE policy_name LIKE '%plastic%';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM environmental_policy_changes WHERE policy_effective_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM environment_policies;
SELECT policy_name, enacted_date FROM environment_policies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, MAX(change_date) as latest_change_date FROM policy_changes GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM environment_policies WHERE enacted_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM environment_policies WHERE enacted_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM environment_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%security%'
SELECT policy_name, enacted_date FROM environment_policies WHERE policy_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY enacted_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT policy_name, change_description, change_date FROM environment_policies JOIN policy_changes ON environment_policies.id = policy_changes.policy_id WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY change_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT enacted_by FROM policy_changes ORDER BY enacted_by ASC
SELECT * FROM environmental_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM environmental_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM environmental_policies WHERE policy_effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(policy_id) AS max_policy_id FROM environmental_policies;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM environmental_policies WHERE policy_effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_changes JOIN environmental_policies ON policy_changes.policy_id = environmental_policies.policy_id;
SELECT policy_name, change_date FROM environmental_policies JOIN policy_changes ON environmental_policies.policy_id = policy_changes.policy_id WHERE policy_changes.change_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT agency_name, agency_contact_email FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE agency_type = 'Government';
SELECT * FROM environmental_policies_changes;
SELECT policy_name, effective_date FROM environmental_policies_changes ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, change_description FROM environmental_policies_changes WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT agency_name, headquarters_location FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT policy_name, rating FROM environmental_policies_changes INNER JOIN policy_ratings ON environmental_policies_changes.policy_id = policy_ratings.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM environmental_policies_changes ORDER BY effective_date DESC, policy_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT policy_name, change_description FROM environmental_policies_changes WHERE policy_id = 5
SELECT p.policy_name, pr.rating FROM environmental_policies_changes p JOIN policy_ratings pr ON p.policy_id = pr.policy_id ORDER BY pr.rating DESC
SELECT pl.log_id, pl.change_date, ra.agency_name FROM policy_changes_log pl JOIN regulatory_agencies ra ON pl.policy_id = ra.agency_id ORDER BY pl.change_date DESC
SELECT ra.agency_name, COUNT(pl.log_id) AS total_changes FROM policy_changes_log pl JOIN regulatory_agencies ra ON pl.policy_id = ra.agency_id GROUP BY ra.agency_name HAVING total_changes > 5
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalPolicies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM EnvironmentalPolicies;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryAgencies WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT agency_name, jurisdiction FROM RegulatoryAgencies WHERE agency_id = 2;
SELECT policy_id, change_date, change_description FROM PolicyChanges WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalPolicies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM EnvironmentalPolicies WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pa.author_name, pc.comment_text FROM PolicyAuthors pa JOIN PolicyComments pc ON pa.author_id = pc.policy_id;
SELECT pa.author_name, count(pc.comment_id) AS comment_count FROM PolicyAuthors pa JOIN PolicyComments pc ON pa.author_id = pc.policy_id GROUP BY pa.author_name;
SELECT rp.agency_name, pc.comment_text FROM RegulatoryAgencies rp LEFT JOIN PolicyComments pc ON rp.agency_id = pc.policy_id;
